message: I'm excited to offer you this amazing product for $15000. It's a great deal, considering its value to you is $8000. I'm confident you'll love it!
I appreciate your enthusiasm, but I was thinking more along the lines of $10000. I'm willing to meet you halfway and make a serious offer. Can you consider this price?
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, Bob, but I'm afraid I need to make a bit more than that to make it worth my while. How about we meet at $13500?
I understand your position, but I'm still a bit hesitant to go that high. Can you meet me at $12000? I'm willing to compromise, but I really want to stay within my budget.
